meaning_str.bing:
adv. 很
adj. 有权势的；有影响力的；强有力的；力量大的
网络. 强大的；有权的；有权威的

有权势的；有影响力的；强有力的；力量大的
强大的；有权的；有权威的

强大的；有力的；有权势的；有影响力的；效果显著的；高效的；大功率的；强劲的；激烈的；令人信服的；有说服力的；健壮的；力量大的；（对身心）有强烈作用的
强有力地；有效地；非常；极其；很；强烈地

1.en: This makes the technique much more powerful, as you'll be able to recall items in a specific order, as we'll see in the next step.
1.cn: 就像我们将在下一步骤中看到的，这会大大增强本技巧的效果，如果你能按照确定的次序回想起物品的话。

2.en: Forgiveness is a powerful place to be mentally, physically, emotionally and psychically . When you are there, you know it!
2.cn: 在心智上、身体上、情感上和精神上，宽恕都是一个强而有力的所在之处。

3.en: Rights of any kind are the community's protection against the unwarranted interference in daily life by an all-powerful central government.
3.cn: 任何类型的权利针对的都是防止日常生活受到大权在握的中央政府的无理干扰，因此对社会具有保护作用。

0.en: Is it really surprising that the most powerful man in the world should be a figure of controversy?
0.cn: 世上最强大的人应该成为争议的焦点，这真值得惊讶吗？

1.en: I knew I couldn't kill them. More powerful men than me have tried. But, if I could get them to kill each other?
1.cn: 我知道自己杀不了他们，比我更强大的人都试过了。但如果我能让他们自相残杀呢？

2.en: You have just delivered to me the most powerful device in the entire universe. Along with your dearest friends. And my dearest enemy.
2.cn: 你给我送来的东西可是整个宇宙当中最最强大的神器，还捎上你最亲爱的朋友，也是我最亲爱的敌人。

3.en: Chip! Chip! Oh, Lord! As punishment she transformed him into a hideous beast. And placed a powerful spell on the castle and all who lived there.
3.cn: 当心！哦，上帝。为了惩罚王子女巫把他变成了一头丑陋的野兽，并且给整座城堡和里面的仆人也施加了强大的魔咒。

4.en: I think if it were exposed to a sufficiently powerful energy source something very similar to its own signature, perhaps its molecular integrity could fail.
4.cn: 我觉得如果它遭遇足够强大的能量源特性类似其本身的能量，那或许它的分子完整性就会被破坏。

5.en: We are not powerful enough to defeat Gul'dan.
5.cn: 以你我的力量还不足以击败古尔丹。

6.cn: 这是一个强而有力的简报：简单地说。

7.en: But isn't it even more powerful coming from me?
7.cn: 但我来说不是更有力吗？

8.en: Because they had a powerful in-built advantage.
8.cn: 因为它们拥有强有力且与生俱来的长处。

9.en: This has been Powerful Presentations: Simply Stated.
9.cn: 这是一个强而有力的简报：简单地说。

10.en: What do you call the only man who can arm the most powerful weapon in the world? The most powerful man in the world.
10.cn: 你会怎么称呼那个世界上拥有最厉害的武器的人？世界的统治者。

11.en: I figured out way back, if god is all powerful, he cannot be all good. And if he is all good, then he cannot be all powerful.
11.cn: 我很久以前就想明白了，如果神是全能的，那么他一定不完美，如果他是完美的，那他就不可能全能。

12.en: Some are great, and have a powerful impact on their audiences.
12.cn: 有的很棒，也对他们的听众有很大的影响力。

13.en: Oh, it's not just that, I would be England's most powerful weapon.
13.cn: 不只如此，我会是英格兰最强力的武器。

14.en: You will meet the richest most powerful king on the face of this earth.
14.cn: 你会遇见这个世上最富有，最有权势的国王。

15.en: Be sure to be careful when you remove them, the product is very powerful.
15.cn: 取出的时候千万小心，那玩意威力可大了。

16.en: And a lot of powerful men with a desire to preserve peace and protect life.
16.cn: 许多掌权者都想要保卫和平，保护生命。

17.en: Imagine a duel. Me and Conway. Now, Conway has a powerful gun, a search engine.
17.cn: 想象一个决斗在我和康威之间展开，康威有一把厉害的枪，一个搜索引擎。

18.en: Since 1849, Kingsman Tailors have clothed the world's most powerful individuals.
18.cn: 从1849年起，金士曼就为世界上最有权势的人服务。

19.en: Well, all these powerful guys. You can make connections here that'll last forever.
19.cn: 这都是有权有势的人，你可以在这里积累永恒的人脉。
